name: Bedroom Breakout
description:
In this sidescroller platformer you play as a little doll that wakes up on the ground. You meet a friend laying on their death bed who tells you to collect the spirits of your dead doll-friends and that you need to escape! To do this, you have to navigate through a children's bedroom and all the unknown dangers that lies ahead. On your way, you meet multiple toys that will help you on you way to freedom, as long as you give them what they need. Don't fall and good luck!

This game is a school project, made by our group DOLLIPOP!
